Title: Long live peace
Publisher: Shanghai huapian chubanshe (上海画片出版社)
Notes: Festive arrival on a railway station, most probably people going to an international conference or event. Among them apparently Russians. This must be a concrete moment/event, but we have not been able to establish which.The text on the banner: Long live world peace - 世界和平万岁 - Shijie heping wan sui.Bottom left is the title in Korean.This is a print from the eighth edition (November 1956).
